item.title: Paper cuts are so painful because at a microscopic level paper is quite rough. A knife makes a straight cut, but paper acts like a saw blade and does more damage to nerve endings. item.description:
Sea otters pet their cheeks because they have glands that secrete oils there. They gather that oil on their paws and then brush it along the rest of their fur to keep it soft, sleek, cleans and waterproof
[video: https://t.co/X7vEx7re2T] https://t.co/UIvvspetW5
